system.description:
Prerequisites

@UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.core-rulebook.Item.WZgKEHaJW8emVPBl]{Personal Firearms Proficiency}, @UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.core-rulebook.Item.PjWBnexrl6cy31Qc]{Handgun Reloader}, @UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.core-rulebook.Item.pTE8c8BZNlsYPWTN]{Handgun Specialist}

Benefits

Once per turn a character can reload a holdout, backup, full-size, or target pistol with a magazine for no Combat Points.
system.summary: Free pistol reload once per turn
